attributes.action: John Bercow should be removed from office and denied any future Honours.
attributes.background:
John Bercow has failed to address the bullying and sexist behaviours prevalent in Parliament and, those laid directly on him.
He now appears not to be impartial.
He has failed to abide by his own selected end date in office because, clearly, he considers himself too important and irreplaceable.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
